pr_title: ORC: OrcFileAppender#length should return file size on disk

timeline.message: ORC: OrcFileAppender#length should return file size on disk

timeline.bodyText: Just want to note here that although we do check length while writing to choose whether to close and start a new file, that doesn't happen for ORC already so it is fine to use a FS call in this method.
timeline.author: rdblue
